metadata.title: AKS Node.js Unsafe Reflection & Prototype Pollution
metadata.description: Detects indicators of unsafe reflection (eval, new Function) and prototype pollution attempts in Node.js application logs.

properties.displayName: AKS Node.js Unsafe Reflection & Prototype Pollution
properties.description: Detects indicators of unsafe reflection (eval, new Function) and prototype pollution attempts in Node.js application logs.
properties.query:
let NodePatterns = dynamic([
    "__proto__",
    "constructor.prototype",
    "eval(",
    "new Function(",
    "vm.runInContext",
    "vm.runInNewContext",
    "vm.runInThisContext",
    "ReferenceError: require is not defined"
]);
ContainerLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where LogEntry has_any (NodePatterns)
| extend
    ContainerId = ContainerID,
    LogMessage = LogEntry,
    PodName = extract("pod=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource))),
    Namespace = extract("namespace=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource)))
| join kind=leftouter (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
    | distinct ContainerID, PodName = Name, Namespace, ClusterName, ContainerName
) on $left.ContainerId == $right.ContainerID
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ContainerName,
    ContainerId,
    LogMessage
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, LogMessage

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Unsafe reflection or prototype pollution indicator detected in container '{{ContainerName}}' in pod '{{PodName}}'. Log: {{LogMessage}}
